help.name: m.help
help.description: I'll respond with this help command.

speak.name: m.speak
speak.description: I'll respond like a ~g o o d b o y e~.

chill.name: m.chill
chill.description: I will start a playlist of chill music on your voice channel.

stop.name: m.stop
stop.description: I will disconnect from the voice channel I'm connected to.
